MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:32pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:20pm on Saturday, 24 April 2021
